name: El Nido de Pingüinos
description:
This is a school project, made for a university course where I had a week to develop an educational platformer using Stencyl. The entire game is in spanish, but understanding the text is not necessary to play the game.

Story

Adélie penguins like to use pebbles for their nests. Help this penguin get the stones she needs for her nest. Use the left and right arrows to walk, and the up arrow to jump. But be careful! There are seals that want to eat you. Avoid them and find the 25 pebbles for your nest.

Controls

Use the left and right keys to move, the up button to jump, and the spacebar to advance through the menus. Avoid the seals, as touching them will hurt you! Get all 25 stones to beat the game!
